
GMSE01
Super Mario Sunshine

Angle To Radians Func
* 060033F8 0000001C
* 3F91DF46 A1FAE712
* 3C608000 C80333F8
* FC010032 FC200018
* 4E800020 00000000

Util Floats
* 060034F0 0000005C
* 59800004 43960000
* 433E0000 00000000
* 3F000000 3FB99999
* 9999999A 3FA99999
* 9999999A 3F800000
* 41F00000 59800000
* 3F500000 C1A00000
* 48000000 42C80000
* C2960000 3F600000
* 3FC00000 42200000
* BF800000 3F700000
* 40400000 00000000

Initialize sound effects RNG with random seed
* 042FD1A0 808D8C70

Restore old level select
* 042A3BDC 480000F8

Show exception handler
* 0429D0BC 60000000

Skip FMVs
* 042B5EF4 38600001
* 042B5E8C 38600001

Level Select
* 042A6788 3BC00009

Fix Velocity Storage
* C22571F0 00000004
* 807F007C 6C630C40
* 28030201 38600000
* 41820008 907F00A8
* 60000000 00000000

Fix Infinite Flutter
* 0428113C C002F824

Flood Till Corona Beat
* 0429961C 38840077

* C22320E0 00000003
* 2C040000 38000000
* 41820008 A0040018
* 60000000 00000000

* 041E68D4 4182000C

* 60000000 00000000
